lead_paragraph: Andy Murray and Novak Djokovic, the dominant forces of men's tennis, will collide head-on in a fitting climax to the season at the ATP World Tour Finals on Sunday after taking vastly different paths to the title match.
snippet: Andy Murray and Novak Djokovic, the dominant forces of men's tennis, will collide head-on in a fitting climax to the season at the ATP World Tour Finals on Sunday after taking vastly different paths to the title match....

headline.main: Murray Survives Epic to Set Up Djokovic Showdown
headline.print_headline: Murray Survives Epic to Set Up Djokovic Showdown
